input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Storm

Item specifications:
A Bowen Designs Sculpture!
Detailed sculpture of Storm from the X-Men franchise in white constume
Statue measures 12" Tall
Sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen
input_text.Response A: Storm, a Bowen Designs sculpture, is an incredibly detailed sculpture of the X-Men franchise's Storm in her white costume.  This statue measures 12" Tall and was sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen.  Storm is poised with arms spread, ready to harness the power of a raging storm.  The attention to detail on this sculpture is truly stunning.  From the flowing fabric of her costume to the individual strands of Storm's hair, this is a work of art that will be a treasured addition to any collection.  Purchase Storm today and harness the power of the storm!
input_text.Response B:
"Storm" Bowen Designs Sculpture

A Bowen Designs Sculpture!

The X-Men's weather-manipulating mutant Storm is brought to life in this all-new sculpt. Storm's costume is detailed right down to the bolts on her boots! Limited to only 3,000 pieces, this 12" tall Storm statue was sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Limited edition , A didn't even report this
